title: Exquisite Diamond and Pearl Nakshi Haaram Set - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with a brilliant Hyderabadi polish. Adorned with high-quality
and featuring accents of Ruby and Emerald gemstones. The gold is hallmarked for purity.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases intricate Nakshi work, a traditional South Indian technique involving detailed hand-engraving. The necklace features a floral motif centerpiece and a complementary pendant. The Jhumka earrings mirror the necklace's floral pattern, creating a cohesive and elegant set. The pearl drops add a touch of grace and sophistication. The filigree design adds to the antique charm.
colors: The set features a warm gold tone beautifully contrasted by the dazzling white diamonds
the vibrant green of the emeralds
the deep red of the rubies
and the soft ivory of the pearls.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings
and other special events. This set also makes a treasured gift for anniversaries
description: This Haaram set is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The combination of traditional Nakshi work with modern diamond setting techniques creates a piece that is both culturally significant and undeniably beautiful. The high-quality diamonds and pearls ensure lasting brilliance and value. Own a piece of Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage.
